001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
006import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion.HexUtil;
007
008/**
009 *
010 */
011public class PrevTxOutInfo implements UtxoInfo {
012    private final Sha256Hash txId;
013    private final int vout;
014    private final Script scriptPubKey;
015    private final String redeemScript;
016    private final String witnessScript;
017    private final Coin amount;
018
019    public PrevTxOutInfo(Sha256Hash txId, int vout, String scriptPubKey, String redeemScript, String witnessScript, Coin amount) {
020        this.txId = txId;
021        this.vout = vout;
022        this.scriptPubKey = Script.parse(HexUtil.hexStringToByteArray(scriptPubKey));
023        this.redeemScript = redeemScript;
024        this.witnessScript = witnessScript;
025        this.amount = amount;
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public Sha256Hash getTxid() {
030        return txId;
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public int getVout() {
035        return vout;
036    }
037
038    @Override
039    public Script getScriptPubKey() {
040        return scriptPubKey;
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public String getRedeemScript() {
045        return redeemScript;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public String getWitnessScript() {
050        return witnessScript;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public Coin getAmount() {
055        return amount;
056    }
057}
